ākārāḥ liṅari m itvā kutham bhaviṣyati

original: eṣaca bodhisatvonāṁ mahāsatvānā gocaraḥ yaḥ sarva dharmmeśva gocaraḥ atracara māṇāmaṁjaśrī bodhisatvo mahāsatvo gocara prasutaśa-acatyute |
